#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ld long double
int sz(int y)
{	int ret = 0;
	while(y>0)
	{
		y/=10;
		ret++;
	}
	return ret;
}
int size(ld a,ld e)
{
	return floor(e*log10(a))+1;

}
int st(ld a,ld e,int val)
{
	return (int)(floor(powl(10.0L,e*log10(a)-(size(a,e)-val))));
}

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	for(int q=1;q<=t;q++)
	{
		ld x;
		int y;
		cin>>x>>y;
		int i = 1;
		int val = sz(y);
		// cout<<val<<endl;
		while(st(x,i,val)!=y && i<10000)
		{
			i++;
		}
		cout<<"Case "<<q<<": "<<i<<endl;
	}
}
